pageContext.claim: “You have a lot of people that are in from other administrations that frankly you keep because you're not allowed to do anything but keep them, okay? And so they’ll do reports [such as on climate change]. And by the way, you're going to have people that are from my administration in years from now that would be very critical of perhaps another president where they disagree with something.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump was asked about reports by his own government that contradict him on climate change. He said it was bound to happen because some of those career officials are from previous administrations. That's beside the point. The scientific consensus is that climate change is real and man contributes to it.
